title: What are Pete Doherty's favorite books? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know his favourite books but he has referenced Brighton Rock by Graham Green a few times. I think the song Kolly Kibber is a based on a character of that name from this book. Also the title of the song “I love you but you’re green” takes “you’re green” from the same book. It’s something a character says. He’s also a fan of Oscar Wilde, particularly The Picture of Dorian Gray
